Package blockchain.usecases.defi

Class DefiTransactionValidator

java.lang.Object
blockchain.TransactionValidator
blockchain.usecases.defi.DefiTransactionValidator
public class DefiTransactionValidator extends TransactionValidator
An implementation of a TransactionValidator for the Defi use case

      Parameters:
      transaction - The transaction we are deciding the validity of
      accounts - Our current accounts which are represented by their public key hash string and their balance in a Map
      assumedT - The transactions we assume to valid so far

    • validate

      public boolean validate(Object[] objects)
      Validates a transaction and updates the wallet of the transaction participants.
      Specified by:
      validate in class TransactionValidator
      Parameters:
      objects - An array of objects containing the transaction and assumed transactions.
      Returns:
      true if the transaction is valid, false otherwise.

    • alertWallet

      public void alertWallet(HashMap<String,Transaction> txMap, MerkleTree mt, Address myAddress)
      Alerts the wallet of relevant participants about updates in their accounts.
      Parameters:
      txMap - The map of transactions.
      mt - The MerkleTree associated with the transactions.
      myAddress - The address of the node sending the alerts.

    • addAccountsToAlert

      Adds accounts to be alerted about updates in their wallets.

      accountPubKey - The public key hash of the account.
      address - The address associated with the account.
